definition[0]: a group of people who try to introduce new ideas in music, films, art, politics etc
example[0]: a new wave of feminism in the sixties and early seventies
definition[1]: a type of music that was popular in the 1970s and early 1980s, which uses synthesizers and a strong beat, and in which the words are sung without much emotion
definition[2]: a new style of music, art, film etc that is very different and unusual
example[2]: the new wave of Black feminist theorists
